原文：1.12 work in progress, save/restore hotbar items in creative mode: imgur.com/a/CXUUK
One request was to restore survival inventory when returning to survival, but I'm a bit stumped how to do that in an understandable way...
... because I commonly switch between the modes to add items for survival, so you need both behaviors
译文：1.12奋斗中……将在创造模式保存/恢复热键栏物品：imgur.com/a/CXUUK
有个请求是在返回到生存模式时恢复生存模式物品栏，现在的挑战是如何制作成令人明白的方法……
因为我一直在两种模式中切换来添加生存模式物品，所以需要两种行为
